text.text_translated:
Suzanne loved old Greek stories when she was a child. They gave her an important idea for the Hunger Games book. One of her favourite stories was about a man named Theseus.

In this story, the king of Crete ruled the city of Athens. But the people of Athens fought back. The king punished them for this. He made Athens send seven boys and seven girls to Crete every year.

They put these young people in a big maze. A monster lived there. The monster's name was the Minotaur. The Minotaur ate the young people.

But one young man was named Theseus. He fought the Minotaur and killed it. Suzanne thinks Katniss Everdeen is a Theseus from the future.
